column6: Annual energy consumption from the grid (kWh)            D
column7: annual Energy Generation from Pv system(KWh)            E
column10: Cost of energy consumed from the Grid kWh/year (₦)      = G*D                           H
column11: annual cost of energy produced by Pv system                J
column12: cost of maintenance= 1% of J                       K
column13: net Annual costof energy produced by Pv system    =J-K                  L
column20: total life time energy production (KWh)  E*25(S)
column22: Cost of energy consumed from the Grid kWh/30yrs (₦)      ( U)
